testsuite.name: LastPencilTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #16
When the user provides a name that is not 'Dante' or 'Vergil', the game should inform the user that their input is incorrect and prompt the user for input again with the "Choose between 'Dante' and 'Vergil'" string.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
How many pencils would you like to use? > 5 Who will be the first (Dante, Vergil) > DanteVergil ||||| DanteVergil's turn
